participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Shy but passionate about singing and new experiences.
participant_1.background: I like to keep my hair natural, but if I were to dye it, I would choose a deep auburn shade. I'm a shy person but I love to sing. I've been married for 15 years, but I still trip over my own feet sometimes. I am not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Active and adventurous, loves learning and enjoys cosplaying.
participant_2.background: I take care of myself physically and mentally. My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains. I'm a young adult who doesn't want my parents to know about my deployment. I've been with my husband for 5 years and we love to cosplay together. I was happy to find a new gym near my home in New Mexico.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you today?
I'm doing well! I'm just excited to start my new job tomorrow!
That's awesome! What kind of job is it?
I'm going to be a ski instructor at a local resort!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to learn how to ski.
It's really fun! You should definitely try it sometime.
I will! I'm sure my husband would love to learn too.
Great! If you ever need any help, let me know!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to go skiing, hiking, and camping. I also enjoy reading and watching movies.
Those all sound like fun activities! I love to read and watch movies too.
What are some of your favorite books and movies?
I love to read anything by Stephen King, and my favorite movies are The Lord of the Rings trilogy and The Shawshank Redemption.
I've read a few of Stephen King's books, but I've never seen any of the Lord of the Rings movies.
You should definitely watch them! They're really good.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
